name: Gobot
description:
Gobot is an intense endless platform survival game focused on dodging falling meteors, Lasers, destroying robots, all while collecting powerups and upgrading abilities to help you survive.

Features include: Mining, Jetpacks, Shields, Droids, Enemy Robots, Lasers, Large Barrier Spikes, Lava, Saw Blades, Upgrades, Abilities, Gun etc.
